text: The 1998 Primera B de Chile was the 48th completed season of the Primera B de Chile. Cobresal was tournament’s champion and was promoted to 1999 Primera División de Chile alongside O'Higgins and Santiago Morning, which achieved the promotion in the Promotion Playoffs. ==League table== ==References== ==External links== * RSSSF 1998 Category:Primera B de Chile seasons Primera B Chil
title: 1998 Primera B de Chile
